summary.p: 24 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 31; Qurʾānic Text: Q 9:114-11:62, Q 23:88-24:62; 15 lines per page; Dimensions: 278 x 193/195mm; Script style: kūfī C.III.
The fragment Arabe 333 (c) (BNF) belongs to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 31
24 fol. 193/195×278 mm (1.42/1.44). Support: parchment of average thickness, semitransparent, of yellowish color. Writing material: brown ink.
Collation: three quires, each consisting of 4 bifolia (fol. 1 and 8 have been detached from each other).
I: H1F H2F H3F H4F / F5H F6H F7H F8H S F10H;
II: H9F H10F H11F H12F / F13H F14H F15H F16H;
III: H17F H18F H20F / H21F H22F F23H F24H
Text layout: 116/120×200 mm (1.666),15 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: C III. Diacritics: diagonal dashes in the ink of the main text, used very seldom. Vocalization: round red dots.
Verse markers: for groups of 10 verses – rosettes of different shapes outlined in brown ink.
Beginning of surahs is marked with stripes of floral ornament drawn in ink and occupying the line left blank before the surah (fol. 1v, 10v, 17r)
Inscriptions: surah numbers have been inscribed in pencil in Roman numerals on the margins of fol, 2v and 11v.
Stitching: threads are preserved in the punctures of the fold; on the outer folds of quires there are traces of brown substance (leather?).
Traces of old conservation: margins of fol. 1 have been trimmed.
Defects: stains and traces of moisture; damage on the lower margins of fol. 1–24 due to the crumbling of parchment; tears along folds; ink has partly peeled off on some of the pages.
Old accession numbers: B. 9 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Contents:
Fol. 1r–2v. Surah 9, verses 115(114) – 130(129)*. Incipit: [عدوٌّ لله] تبرّأ منه.
Fol. 2v–11v. Surah 10.
Fol. 11v–16v. Surah 11, verses 1(1) – 65(62). Explicit: مَرْجُوًّا قبل [هذا] .
Fol. 17r–18r. Surah 23, verses 90(88) – 118(118)*. Incipit: [أفلا تتّقون *] قل من بيده.
Fol. 18r–24v. Surah 24, verses 1(1) – 62(62). Explicit: إنّ الذين [يستأذنونك] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Arabe 333c (BNF)."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
